name: Jigsaw Club
summary:
Jigsaw Club is not only give your entertainment pastime but also help you. Difficulty of Jigsaw Club can be chosen by yourself, easy jigsaw puzzles can increase people's sense of accomplishment and the difficult jigsaw puzzles can cultivate people's patience and increase their observation.

Jigsaw Club is a funny and unique jigsaw puzzle game. It covers variety of HD albums, each one can be amazing your eyes! Jigsaw Club can enhance your observation, develop patience, and focus. Choose a jigsaw puzzle, it can provide you a few hours of happiness.

-Key of Jigsaw Club -
·Beautiful HD pictures in various albums.
·Easy and relaxing to play, try to be a jigsaw club！
·Enjoyable game for all age and gender.
·Play whenever and wherever you want.
·Improve hand eye coordination
·Unique and funny jigsaw puzzles to play with. 
·Follow your own rhythm: Make the jigsaw as you want.

Take a break at anytime and anywhere with Jigsaw Club. Can't miss it on your devices！

Subscription Information
Subscriber can enjoy the following services during the subscription period:
-Unlock all category pictures.
-Enjoy weekly picks pictures.
-Resources keep updating.
-Cancel anytime.
- Subscriptions are from $49.99 USD weekly
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "one week" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package (weekly package).
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039 for more information.
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases Jigsaw Club subscription.
